§8§oJack C. Straton§r

§72024§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oThis comprehensive revision makes clear the new series representation's utilityfor analytical work. It also better highlights the summed series involving _2F_3 hypergeometric functions. Despite the analytical purpose, a
new appendix gives quadruple-precision polynomial approximations for J_0,J_1, I_0 and I_1, accurate to 33-digits for |x|<=3 and versions useful for integer arithmetic\u00a7r
